mapper.select: select count(*) from rec_file where b_no = #{b_no} and filetype = 'R'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT M.I_NAME, MATERIALCNT, M.B_NO, I_NO, M_no FROM REC_BOARD B, REC_MATERIAL M WHERE M.B_NO = B.B_NO ) WHERE B_NO = #{b_no}
mapper.insert: insert into like_recipe (l_no, m_no, b_no) values (seq_l_no.nextval, #{mno}, #{b_no})
mapper.select: SELECT rb.*, rf.uploadpath || rf.uuid || '_' || rf.filename AS savePath, CASE WHEN rf.filetype = 'B' THEN 's_' || rf.uploadpath || rf.uuid || '_' || rf.filename ELSE '' END AS s_savePath FROM rec_board rb JOIN rec_file rf ON rb.b_no = rf.b_no WHERE rb.b_no IN ( SELECT b_no FROM like_recipe WHERE m_no = #{mno} ) AND rf.filetype = 'B'

SELECT rb.*, rf.uploadpath || rf.uuid || '_' || rf.filename AS savePath, CASE WHEN rf.filetype = 'B' THEN 's_' || rf.uploadpath || rf.uuid || '_' || rf.filename ELSE '' END AS s_savePath FROM rec_board rb JOIN rec_file rf ON rb.b_no = rf.b_no WHERE rb.mno = #{mno} AND rf.filetype = 'B'
SELECT r.*, b.title FROM rec_reply r JOIN rec_board b ON r.b_no = b.b_no WHERE r.writer = #{writer}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT rr.*, rb.title AS title FROM rec_reply rr JOIN rec_board rb ON rr.b_no = rb.b_no WHERE rb.mno = #{mno}) t ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM rec_reply rr JOIN rec_board rb ON rr.b_no = rb.b_no WHERE rb.mno = #{mno}
